title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.9 - Public notice

State Regulations

The Department of Motor Vehicles has posted a sign setting
forth the location where public records shall be available for inspection and
copying, the title and business address of the records access officer and
fiscal officer, and the right to appeal by any requester denied access to a
record for whatever reason and the title and business address of the person to
whom an appeal is to be directed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
160.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
